tasks.instructions: You should spend about 40 minutes on this task
tasks.topic: The world of work is rapidly changing and employees cannot depend on having the same job or the same working conditions for life. Discuss the possible causes and suggest ways to prepare people to work in the future.
requirements: Give reasons for your answer and include any relevant examples from your own knowledge or experience.
